name: NATIVE EXTRACTS Bitter Orange Cellular Extract
description: Bitter Orange Cellular Extract are created using purified, deionized rain-harvested water and less plant material to produce a True to Nature extract. With attention to eco-sustainable practices, traceable to source and transparent in composition ingredients Cellular Extracts deliver the brilliance of nature. Discover the next generation Bitter Orange Cellular Extract and the new possibilities achieved by working with its multifunctional profile of phyto-actives. Packed with potent anti-inflammatory properties creating an exciting new consideration for acne/teenage, inflamed or stressed skin care.

INCI Name: Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Fruit Extract
Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Fruit Extract
